channel.title: Running a server 24/7 client crashes need help extending memory
channel.description:
ok i run the slient for a while and then eventually it says it ran out of memory im running on 2gb no lag server im trying to keep it 24/7 how do i stop the client from running out of memory and stopping?
It says it runs out of memory and when people log in it says there already logged in when its runs out of memory how do i exstend this feature so i can have the server running for a longer period of time maybe 24 hours instead of like 1-3 depending on how many people are playing please help someone.!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Running a server 24/7 client crashes need help extending memory
item.dc:creator: @wow_raped_XD wow_raped XD
item.description:
@wow_raped_XD wrote:

Server Restarter? Or maybe a new cilent

Read full topic
